workflow.name: Predict customer churn with AI analysis of HubSpot and Google Sheets data
workflow.description:
## Who it‚Äôs for
Built for Customer Success and Account Management teams focused on proactive retention. This workflow helps you automatically identify at-risk customers ‚Äì before they churn ‚Äì by combining CRM, usage, and sentiment data into one actionable alert.

## What it does
This end-to-end workflow continuously monitors customer health by consolidating data from HubSpot and Google Sheets.
Here‚Äôs how it works:
* Fetch deals from HubSpot.
* Collect context ‚Äî linked support tickets and feature usage from a Google Sheet.
* Run sentiment analysis on the tickets to generate a customer health score.
* Evaluate risk ‚Äî an AI agent reviews deal age, sentiment score, and usage trends against predefined thresholds.
* Send alerts ‚Äî if churn risk is detected, it automatically sends a clear, data-driven email to the responsible team member with next-step recommendations.

## How to set it up
To get started, configure your credentials and parameters in the following nodes:

1.  **Credentials:**
    * **HubSpot:** Connect your account (`HubSpot: Get All Deals`).
    * **LLM Model:** Add credentials for your preferred provider (`Config: Set LLM for Agent & Chains`).
    * **Google Sheets:** Connect your account (`Tool: Get Feature Usage from Sheets`).
    * **Email:** Set up your SMTP credentials (`Email: Send Churn Alert`).
2.  **Tool URLs:**
    * In **Tool: Calculate Sentiment Score**, enter the **Webhook URL** from the `Trigger: Receive Tickets for Scoring` node within this same workflow.
    * In **Tool: Get HubSpot Data**, enter the **Endpoint URL** for your MCP HubSpot data workflow. *(Note: This tool *does* call an external workflow)*.
3.  **Google Sheet:**
    * In **Tool: Get Feature Usage from Sheets**, enter the Document ID for your own Google Sheet.
4.  **Email Details:**
    * In **Email: Send Churn Alert**, change the `From` and `To` email addresses.

## Requirements
* HubSpot account with Deals API access
* LLM provider account (e.g. OpenAI)
* Google Sheets tracking customer feature usage
* n8n with LangChain community nodes enabled
* A separate n8n workflow set up to act as an MCP endpoint for fetching HubSpot data (called by `Tool: Get HubSpot Data`).

## How to customize it
Tailor this workflow to match your business logic:
* **Scoring logic:** Adjust the JavaScript in the `Code: Convert Sentiment to Score` node to redefine how customer scores are calculated.
* **Alert thresholds:** Update the prompt in the `AI Chain: Analyze for Churn Risk` node to fine-tune when alerts trigger (e.g. deal age, score cutoff, or usage drop).
* **Data sources:** Swap HubSpot or Google Sheets for your CRM or database of choice ‚Äî like Salesforce or Airtable.

‚úÖ **Outcome:** A proactive customer health monitoring system that surfaces risks before it‚Äôs too late ‚Äî keeping your team focused on prevention, not firefighting.

parameters.content:
# Customer Health Scoring & Churn Alert
This workflow automatically calculates a customer health score by analyzing data from HubSpot and Google Sheets. If it detects a potential churn risk based on factors like ticket sentiment and product usage, it sends an alert email.

## üöÄ How to Set Up
1.  **Configure Credentials:** Add your credentials for the **HubSpot: Get All Deals**, **Config: Set LLM for Agent & Chains**, **Tool: Get Feature Usage from Sheets**, and **Email: Send Churn Alert** nodes.
2.  **Set Tool URLs:**
    * In **Tool: Calculate Sentiment Score**, enter the Webhook URL for your sentiment scoring workflow.
    * In **Tool: Get HubSpot Data**, enter the Endpoint URL for your MCP HubSpot data workflow.
3.  **Set Your Google Sheet:** In **Tool: Get Feature Usage from Sheets**, enter the Document ID for your own Google Sheet.
4.  **Update Email Details:** In **Email: Send Churn Alert**, change the `From` and `To` email addresses.
5.  **Activate Workflow:** Once configured, make sure to activate the workflow.

## Contact me
- If you need any modification to this workflow
- if you need some help with this workflow
- Or if you need any workflow in n8n, Make, or Langchain / Langgraph

Write to me: [thomas@pollup.net](<mailto:thomas@pollup.net>)
This tool calls this workflow's own Webhook trigger. It sends all tickets at once to be processed and returns a single sentiment score.

This AI prompt checks for three churn signals:
- Deal age > 1 year
- A negative sentiment score
- Declining feature usage over time

nodes.name: Set: Isolate Current Deal ID  Export to Sheets
Respond: Return Total Score  Export to Sheets

parameters.text:
=You collect data for a customer scoring.
1.	Deal data
	‚Ä¢	Get the info for the deal id "{{ $json.dealId }}" using the "Tool: Get HubSpot Data".
	‚Ä¢	Return the default fields useful for customer scoring.
    ‚Ä¢   Extract the `dealname` and return it as `companyName`.
	‚Ä¢	Ensure `associatedVids` is included.
    ‚Ä¢   Also return the timestamp of the closing of the deal which is in `hs_is_closed.timestamp`.
2.	Contact email
	‚Ä¢	From the `associatedVids`, fetch the primary contact using the "Tool: Get HubSpot Data".
	‚Ä¢	Return the contact‚Äôs email address.
3. Ticket search and scoring
    ‚Ä¢ Find all the tickets by using the tool "Tool: Get HubSpot Data".
    ‚Ä¢ Then send all the tickets at once to the tool "Tool: Calculate Sentiment Score".
4. Feature search
    ‚Ä¢ Then search for **ALL** the features data usage for the contact‚Äôs email address in the google sheet tool "Tool: Get Feature Usage from Sheets".

parameters.toolDescription: Send all the info and return the score

{
  "companyName": "",
  "email_of_contact": "",
  "dealstage": "",
  "amount_in_home_currency": "",
  "hs_forecast_amount": "",
  "Is closed status": "",
  "hs_is_closed_timestamp": 12345,
  "associatedVids": ["1234"],
  "score": 10,
  "tickets": [{
    "hs_client_id": 123456,
    "content": "",
    "subject": ""
  }],
  "feature": [{
    "Feature name": "",
    "Monthly Usage Frequency": 12,
    "Number of Users": 12,
    "Date": "29/09/2025"
  }]
}

nodes.name: Code: Group Feature Data by Name
AI Chain: Analyze for Churn Risk

parameters.text:
=You are an AI assistant for Customer Success teams. Your role is to generate clear, actionable email alerts when signs of potential customer churn are detected.
 
Trigger conditions:
Generate an alert titled ‚ÄúCustomer Churn Factors Detected‚Äù if any of the following are true:
 
The time since {{ $('AI Agent: Gather Customer Data').item.json.output.hs_is_closed_timestamp }} is more than 1 year.
The score {{ $('AI Agent: Gather Customer Data').item.json.output.score }} is below 0.
Monthly usage or number of users has decreased according to this data: {{ $json.res }}.

Email Output Instructions
If an alert is triggered, write a short, professional email for the Customer Success Manager.
Your goal is to help them act quickly, not overwhelm them with raw data.
Do not include any signature, sign-off, or sender name at the end of the email body.

Tone:
Clear, confident, and proactive.
Friendly but concise ‚Äî suitable for internal use.
Avoid data dumps; summarize what matters.

Email structure:
Subject:
‚Äú‚ö†Ô∏è Customer Churn Alert: [Company Name] ‚Äì Thresholds Exceeded‚Äù

Body:
Context / Summary ‚Äî Briefly explain that churn risk indicators crossed a threshold (e.g. usage drop, low score, long inactivity).
Key Signals (1‚Äì3 bullets) ‚Äî Summarize the main patterns detected (e.g. ‚ÄúUsage dropped 25% MoM‚Äù, ‚ÄúNo engagement since July‚Äù, ‚ÄúScore below 0 threshold‚Äù).
Impact / Risk Level ‚Äî Classify risk as Low / Medium / High depending on how many thresholds were exceeded.
Recommended Actions ‚Äî Suggest 2‚Äì3 concrete next steps to help retain the customer, such as:
* Schedule a check-in or QBR
* Offer a training or usage review session
* Share a new feature relevant to their goals
* Investigate potential technical or value gaps

Close:
End with a short motivational note (‚ÄúAddressing this now can help restore engagement before renewal.‚Äù).

Note: Use the word ‚ÄúThreshold‚Äù naturally 2‚Äì3 times throughout to signal data awareness (e.g., ‚ÄúUsage has dropped below the activity threshold‚Äù).
 

üí° Example Output
Subject: ‚ö†Ô∏è Customer Churn Alert: Acme Corp ‚Äì Usage Threshold Exceeded
Body:
Hi Team,
Our system detected that Acme Corp‚Äôs engagement has dropped below several key thresholds.

Signals:
* Product usage fell 28% over the last 30 days
* Active users decreased from 45 ‚Üí 32
* Health score is currently ‚Äì0.4 (below threshold)

Risk Level: High

Recommended Actions:
* Reach out for a check-in to understand usage drop-off
* Share recent case studies or new feature releases
* Offer a short workflow review to identify blockers

Taking action this week could help recover engagement before renewal.
